= itemlevel( min, max ) =

Checks if the itemlevel (iLevel) of an item is equal to or between the min and max arguments

== Alias ==
`ilvl()`

`statlevel()`

== Arguments ==

  * min = minimum iLevel to search for
  * max = maximum iLevel to search for

== Remarks ==
  * the iLevel can be found on the debug info menu for that item
  * when only the min argument is passed then the function checks for an exact level match 

== Examples ==

`itemlevel( 115 )`

`ilvl( 90-100 )`
